reviews.review: Phenomenal and well balanced movie taking you for an unforgettable adventure! I really enjoyed it and it took me on en emotional roller coaster.
A perfect culmination of everything that has led here.
Amazing! Sometimes it went too fast and didnâ€™t let me processed what happened in the previous scene but still great, obviously leaving you for more after such a cliffhanger ending
Really good! Except as usual, parts from Guardians of the Galaxy's jokes kind of killed the pacing at times. But I completely recommend it! It was an emotional roller coaster!

Infinity War was a thrill ride, worthy of my top 3. While there are so many superheroes stuffed into one movie I felt as though everyone got one scene where they shined. Thanos was the most menacing villain of the MCU. My standouts had to be Iron Man, Thor, Thanos, Ebony Maw, Doctor Strange and Spiderman.
Huge fan of the franchise but so disappointed with this outcome. I'm reminded of that derelict Last Jedi refuse. Better luck on the next of these hopefully.

Epic, comedic, and tragic. Loved how this movie focused a lot on the villian, Thanos. Finally the villian wins. Marvel went all out with this one. IMAX 3D was stunning. Best 3D visuals I've seen. All the. visual effects were amazing except for the the one scene where Bruce Banner was in the Iron Hulk Buster.

This movie is a childhood dream come true. 10 years in the making. The huge number of characters are well balanced. The heave tone of the movie mixed with marvel style comedy was spot on. The action is grand scale epic. Seeing the parallels with the comic was awesome. (Spoiler) Bruce banner takes silver surfers spot crashing into the sanctum. Ready for Avengers 4!

A rewarding experience for people who have watched all the Marvel movies since Iron Man from 2008. It is also a new concept to movie series where multiple movies are not sequel to the other but in the meantime totally related.
